meanings.definition: The plural form of basion, which is the lowest point of the anterior margin of the foramen magnum.
meanings.sent1: Doctors study the basions to understand the structure of the skull.
meanings.sent2: The basions play a crucial role in connecting the brain to the spinal cord.
meanings.sent3: The basions decided to throw a party at the bottom of the skull.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the basions holding up the brain.
meanings.sent5: The basions, like tiny pillars, support the brain above.

meanings.definition: A plural form of basion, which is the point on the skull where the base of the brain meets the spinal cord.
meanings.sent1: The basions provide a stable foundation for the brain and spinal cord connection.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched the basions on the skull during the anatomy class.
meanings.sent3: The basions on the skull seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as strong as the bond between the basions.
meanings.sent5: The basions, like bridges, link the brain and spinal cord together.
